lead_paragraph: The company said severance costs from closing some operations in Paris hurt its bottom line. More troubling was a decline in once-strong digital advertising.

headline.print_headline: Times Co. Reports Loss, and a Drop in Digital Ads
headline.main: New York Times Co. Reports a Loss, and a Fall in Digital Ad Revenue

snippet: The company said severance costs from closing some operations in Paris hurt its bottom line. More troubling was a decline in once-strong digital advertising....
abstract: New York Times reports second-quarter loss of about $500,000, compared with profit of $16 million in year-ago quarter; revenue was $373 million, down 3 percent from $383 million; says digital subscriptions rose 25 percent to 1.4 million, but digital advertising fell.
